CEO_ChairOfBoard.name: Jo-Anne Sinclair
CEO_ChairOfBoard.description: a chief executive officer, the highest-ranking person in a company or other institution, ultimately responsible for making managerial decisions.

COO_VPOperations.name: Jackson Smith
COO_VPOperations.description: -The chief operating officer (COO) is responsible for executing and implementing the operational directives set by the CEO and the board of directors

CFO_VPAdministration.name: Susan Thomas
CFO_VPAdministration.description: a chief financial officer, a senior executive with responsibility for the financial affairs of a corporation or other institution. The vice president of administration position is responsible for directing all of the administrative functions of the corporation in accordance with industry standards, where applicable, regulatory agencies, as appropriate and company objectives and policies

VP_ClientServices.name: Richa Kaur
VP_ClientServices.description: responsible for the Consumer Banking division performing a variety of roles including lending, investing, risk management, marketing, and technology. Their team provides a suite of solutions to help our retail customers meet their financial goals. Also responsible for the Commercial Banking Division performing a variety of roles including lending, investing, risk management, marketing, and technology. Their team provides a suite of solutions to help our retail customers meet their financial goals.

CIO.name: Josee Benjamin
CIO.description: Chief Information Officer (CIO), chief digital information officer (CDIO) or information technology (IT) director is a job title commonly given to the most senior executive in an bank responsible for the traditional information technology and computer systems that support bank goals.

VP_SalesAndMarketing.name: Vincent Grey
VP_SalesAndMarketing.description: are responsible for the overall strategic marketing plans for an entire organization (or lines of business and brands within an organization) in order to attract potential customers and retain existing ones.

Director_FinancialAndAuditServices.name: Rupa Kharki (she/her/hers)
Director_FinancialAndAuditServices.description: sometimes called a compliance manager is to make sure that a company is conducting its business in full compliance with all national and international laws and regulations that pertain to its particular industry, as well as professional standards, accepted business practices.

Director_HumanResources.name: Xun Kuang
Director_HumanResources.description: HR may be responsible for a number of job duties related to organizational development, recruitment and staffing, employment law, performance management, employee relations, and compensation and benefits.

Director_LegalServices_GeneralCounsel.name: Stien Pedersen
Director_LegalServices_GeneralCounsel.description: is the senior executive managing legal affairs for the company.

Director_InformationTechnology.name: Sandra Bear
Director_InformationTechnology.description: manages the IT infrastructure, operations, and services; and how it enables businesses/individuals to access and make use of data and services.

Director_InformationSecurity_CISSO.name: Gus Blue
Director_InformationSecurity_CISSO.description: manages the IT infrastructure, operations, and services; and how it enables businesses/individuals to access and make use of data and services.

Director_Accounting.name: Sam Kong
Director_Accounting.description: s responsible for in analysis and reconciliation of accounts and in development and implementation of accounting policies, procedures and controls

Director_PhysicalSecurity.name: Valentine Smith
Director_PhysicalSecurity.description: The Director of Physical Security is responsible for identifying, assessing, and integrating physical security operations, technology, and policy solutions at the organization.

Director_Facilities.name: Mariya Kaperski
Director_Facilities.description: Oversees the management and maintenance of all company facilities. Ensures buildings, equipment, and workspaces are safe, efficient, and meet organizational needs.

Manager_BusinessContinuity_DisasterRecov.name: Abd al-Hamid Alami
Manager_BusinessContinuity_DisasterRecov.description: Develop, maintain, or implement business continuity and disaster recovery strategies and solutions, including risk assessments, business impact analyses, strategy selection, and documentation of business continuity and disaster recovery procedures.

Manager_InternalAudit.name: Victoria Gray
Manager_InternalAudit.description: A key part of this role is performing full audits, including risk management, control management, and assessing financial reliability. The audit processes ensure that compliance is met within all the company's systems.

ChiefArchitect.name: Cheryl Guru
ChiefArchitect.description: Responsible for defining the overall technical vision and architecture of systems. Ensures technology solutions align with business goals and are scalable and secure.

Manager_SecurityArchitecture.name: Jean Ngoy
Manager_SecurityArchitecture.description: plays a crucial role in designing and overseeing the implementation of security measures for an organization's information systems. They ensure that the systems are designed and built to be resistant to potential threats while remaining compliant with security policies and regulations

SolutionArchitect_OnlineBanking.name: Kris Gold
SolutionArchitect_OnlineBanking.description: Designs the technical architecture for online banking systems. Ensures solutions are secure, scalable, and aligned with business and customer needs.

Manager_ApplicationSolutions.name: Isaac Smith
Manager_ApplicationSolutions.description: Oversees the design, development, and deployment of business applications. Ensures solutions meet organizational needs and integrate effectively with existing systems.

LeadDeveloper_OnlineBanking.name: Payton Frost
LeadDeveloper_OnlineBanking.description: Leads the development and maintenance of the bankâ€™s online banking platforms. Ensures secure, reliable, and user-friendly digital services for customers.

Manager_OperationalRisk.name: Samantha Nettle
Manager_OperationalRisk.description: is responsible for monitoring, handling, and measuring operational and economic risk exposures in order to minimize risk and place appropriate controls in place

Manager_VendorRelations.name: Yolanda Ferreira
Manager_VendorRelations.description: Manages relationships with external vendors and suppliers to ensure quality and cost-effectiveness. Oversees contracts, negotiations, and vendor performance.

Manager_Purchasing.name: Samir Hassan
Manager_Purchasing.description: - is responsible for leading all global procurement efforts to efficiently and effectively enable spend owners such as business units and functional partners to maximize the value they receive from suppliers to meet their objectives

Manager_Communications.name: Yuna Aikawa
Manager_Communications.description: Oversees internal and external communications to ensure clear, consistent messaging. Manages public relations, media, and organizational communication strategies.

Manager_CustomerExperience_CommunityEnga.name: Jonathan Carberry
Manager_CustomerExperience_CommunityEnga.description: The major goal of CEM is to foster customer loyalty through high-quality interactions at each step. Customer experience managers are the people responsible for improving the experiences customers have with organizations, with the goal of increasing customer satisfaction.

Manager_Sales.name: Roland Wei
Manager_Sales.description: lead a sales team by providing guidance, training, and mentorship, setting sales quotas and goals, creating sales plans, analyzing data, assigning sales territories and building their team.

Manager_Marketing.name: Pran Singh
Manager_Marketing.description: are responsible for developing, implementing and executing strategic marketing plans for an entire organization (or lines of business and brands within an organization) in order to attract potential customers and retain existing ones
